thread.title_full: Baltimore Ravens vs. San Francisco 49ers Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015

author: Tony Tellez
title: Baltimore Ravens vs. San Francisco 49ers Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015
text:
Point Spread Odds: Ravens -2 1/2 points 
Over Under Total: 44   Ravens –140 odds with 49ers +120 odds 
Notes: Baltimore drops to 1-4 with the 33-30 home overtime defeat last week to the Cleveland Browns as a -6   The total went over 43 points. The Ravens pass defense was very poor by allowing Browns quarterback Josh McCown to pass for 457 yards and two touchdowns. The Ravens lost despite getting their run game going for 181 yards. Baltimore is 25th in scoring defense by allowing 27.4 points per game to opponents. 
San Francisco falls to 1-4 with the 30-27 road defeat last week to the New York Giants as a +7 ½ point wagering underdog. The game went over 43 ½ points. The 49ers couldn’t hold a 27-23 lead late as they allowed an Eli Manning 12 year touchdown pass with 21 seconds left. The 49ers defense was lit up for 525 yards with 441 passing yards and three touchdown throws by Manning. San Francisco is 31st in second to last in the NFL in total defense by allowing 406 yards per game. 
Baltimore Ravens versus San Francisco 49ers
